meanings.definition: A setting or adjustment that is predetermined or pre-established.
meanings.sent1: The camera had different presets for various lighting conditions.
meanings.sent2: I always use the presets on my microwave to quickly heat up my food.
meanings.sent3: The robot chef mistakenly used the dessert presets for the main course!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a library with presets for every emotion she could feel.
meanings.sent5: The presets on the thermostat made it easy to keep the room at the perfect temperature.

meanings.definition: To set or adjust something in advance.
meanings.sent1: Before the concert, the sound engineer presets the levels for each instrument.
meanings.sent2: I like to presets my alarm clock before going to bed.
meanings.sent3: The magician presets his tricks to ensure a flawless performance.
meanings.sent4: She presets her goals like a roadmap to success.
meanings.sent5: The artist presets the colors on his palette before starting a new painting.
